# Bo Joel Svensson

> Bo Joel Svensson (also known as Joel Svensson) is a software engineer and
> programming language researcher. He is the creator and primary developer of
> LispBM, a concurrent Lisp dialect for microcontrollers.

## Identity

- Full name: Bo Joel Svensson
- Also known as: Joel Svensson
- Current affiliation: SAAB
- Previous affiliations: Chalmers University of Technology, RISE Research
  Institutes of Sweden (Bor√•s), Indiana University Bloomington
- Not affiliated with Lund University

## Profiles

- Website: https://www.lispbm.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/svenssonjoel
- Personal site: https://svenssonjoel.github.io
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bo-joel-svensson-711b7019/
- ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0363-1206
- ResearchGate: https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Bo-Joel-Svensson
- X: https://x.com/sve10362122

## Projects

- LispBM: A concurrent Lisp dialect for microcontrollers (ESP32, STM32, NRF52)
  with garbage collection, message passing, and a bytecode compiler.
  Source: https://github.com/svenssonjoel/lispBM
  Website: https://www.lispbm.com
